_cisco-uds Provides the location of Cisco Unified Communications Manager version 9 and higher.

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

Calls that are not answered by the user are for the location. If the user at extension 11112222 does not have a voice mailbox, which rule is utilized when Cisco
Unity Communication receives the forwarded call?

comments.content: C is the correct answer. The call will hit the Forward Routing Table where its evaluated against the first rule "Attempt Forward". This rule does not provide a match as the user doesnt have a mailbox configured (so effectively doesnt exist in Unity Cnx - I know you can configure a user/alias without a mailbox but i think this question is trying to make you think the user doesnt actually exist in Unity Cnx). The 2nd rule is then evaluated where it fails again. The call gets a match based on the "Arizona_AA" based on the dialled number.

discussion.content:
Actually, Unity will use Attempt Forward rule but it is not on the list of the answers

"When Unity Connection receives a call, it first determines if it is a direct or forwarded call based on the call information that is sent by the phone system, and then applies the applicable call routing table. If the call information matches all of the conditions for the first rule, the call is routed as specified in the rule. If any of the conditions specified in the first rule are not met, the call information is then compared to the conditions of the second rule, and so on, until a rule is found that matches all the characteristics of the call."

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/connection/10x/administration/guide/10xcucsagx/10xcucsag080.html#pgfId-1129913

Selected Answer: C
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/jabber/Windows/9_7/CJAB_BK_C606D8A9_00_cisco-jabber-dns-configuration-guide/CJAB_BK_C606D8A9_00_cisco-jabber-dns-configuration-guide_chapter_010.html

questions.question_text: Which DNS record is used for on-premises service by Jabber clients?
Which two command line arguments can you specify when installing Cisco Jabber for windows? (Choose two.)
Fraudulent calls are being made from Cisco Unity Connection. Which action prevents the calls from reaching the PSTN using SCCP integration?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
If the integration between CUCM and CUC is Skinny Call Control Protocol (SCCP) - The Voicemail Port's Calling Search Space (CSS) must have the partition of the Route Pattern (RP) to the Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) number.
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/unified-communications/unity-connection/119337-technote-cuc-00.html

choices.B: Change the CSS of the voicemail port.
choices.A: Change the configuration of the routing rule.
choices.C: Change the Rerouting CSS on the trunk to Cisco Unity Connection.
